Perfect size to serve a Main Dish. These Biodegradable Plates make a Great Choice for your Daily Meals or Restaurants, Special Events, Weddings, Parties and other types of Food Service Environments. üçÄ 100% Sugarcane Bagasse The 10 inch plate is made of 100% Sugarcane Fiber, a Sustainable, Renewable, and Biodegradable Material. A great Alternative to Traditional Paper or Plastic, the Disposable Plate Offers the same Sturdy Function and Easy Cleanup, Yet it s Completely Tree and Plastic free. üçÄ 100% Compostable These plates can be Commercially Composted (no need to send it to a landfill).
